comments:
On Linux, unzip eclipse-SDK-3.2RC6-linux-gtk.tar.gz and run Eclipse.
The Welcome view is blank, exception in the log.

Fails using Classic VM (build 1.4.2, J2RE 1.4.2 IBM build cxia32142-20050929 (SR3) (JIT enabled: jitc))

Problem does not occur with IBM J9 VM (build 2.3, J2RE 1.5.0 IBM J9 2.3 Linux x86-32 j9vmxi3223ifx-20060124 (JIT enabled)
